languages.text: "Ах кто же, кто же почтил нас своим присутствием на этот раз? Еще одна кучка еретиков и предателей, жаждущих получить по заслугам за свои преступления? Или же сам{mf||а} предводитель{mf||ница}, уставш{mf|ий|ая} прятаться за чужими спинами?"

traits.locale_text: "Ах кто же, кто же почтил нас своим присутствием на этот раз? Еще одна кучка еретиков и предателей, жаждущих получить по заслугам за свои преступления? Или же сам{mf||а} предводитель{mf||ница}, уставш{mf|ий|ая} прятаться за чужими спинами?"

languages.text: "And who now deigns to grace us with their presence? Another gaggle of heretics and traitors thirsting to get their due for what they've done? Or is it the leader {mf|himself|herself}, who has finally grown tired of hiding behind others?"
languages.original_text: "Ах кто же, кто же почтил нас своим присутствием на этот раз? Еще одна кучка еретиков и предателей, жаждущих получить по заслугам за свои преступления? Или же сам{mf||а} предводитель{mf||ница}, уставш{mf|ий|ая} прятаться за чужими спинами?"

traits.locale_text: "And who now deigns to grace us with their presence? Another gaggle of heretics and traitors thirsting to get their due for what they've done? Or is it the leader {mf|himself|herself}, who has finally grown tired of hiding behind others?"

"And who now deigns to grace us with their presence? Another gaggle of heretics and traitors thirsting to get their due for what they've done? Or is it the leader {mf|himself|herself}, who has finally grown tired of hiding behind others?"

"And who now deigns to grace us with their presence? Another gaggle of heretics and traitors thirsting to get their due for what they've done? Or is it the leader {mf|himself|herself}, who has finally grown tired of hiding behind others?"

"And who now deigns to grace us with their presence? Another gaggle of heretics and traitors thirsting to get their due for what they've done? Or is it the leader {mf|himself|herself}, who has finally grown tired of hiding behind others?"

languages.text: “看啊，是什么人屈尊纡贵来拜访我们了？又是一群异端分子和叛徒，打算为自己的所作所为得到应有的下场吗？还是这群叛徒的领袖本人，终于不想继续躲在别人后面了？”
languages.original_text: "And who now deigns to grace us with their presence? Another gaggle of heretics and traitors thirsting to get their due for what they've done? Or is it the leader {mf|himself|herself}, who has finally grown tired of hiding behind others?"

traits.locale_text: “看啊，是什么人屈尊纡贵来拜访我们了？又是一群异端分子和叛徒，打算为自己的所作所为得到应有的下场吗？还是这群叛徒的领袖本人，终于不想继续躲在别人后面了？”

languages.text: «¿Y ahora quién se digna a honrarnos con su presencia? ¿Otra panda de herejes y traidores en busca de la redención? ¿O es su mismísim{mf|o|a} líder, cansad{mf|o|a} por fin de esconderse detrás de otros?».
languages.original_text: "And who now deigns to grace us with their presence? Another gaggle of heretics and traitors thirsting to get their due for what they've done? Or is it the leader {mf|himself|herself}, who has finally grown tired of hiding behind others?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y ahora quién se digna a honrarnos con su presencia? ¿Otra panda de herejes y traidores en busca de la redención? ¿O es su mismísim{mf|o|a} líder, cansad{mf|o|a} por fin de esconderse detrás de otros?».

languages.text: 「そして今、私達にその存在を持って名誉を賜ってくださるのは誰？自分たちのやったことの報いを受けたいと渇望している異端者や裏切り者？それとも、ついに他人の後ろに隠れることに飽いたリーダー？」
languages.original_text: "And who now deigns to grace us with their presence? Another gaggle of heretics and traitors thirsting to get their due for what they've done? Or is it the leader {mf|himself|herself}, who has finally grown tired of hiding behind others?"

traits.locale_text: 「そして今、私達にその存在を持って名誉を賜ってくださるのは誰？自分たちのやったことの報いを受けたいと渇望している異端者や裏切り者？それとも、ついに他人の後ろに隠れることに飽いたリーダー？」

languages.text: "Und wer erfreut uns nun mit seiner geschätzte Anwesenheit? Eine weitere Schar von Ketzern und Verrätern, die danach dürsten, den Lohn für ihre Taten zu empfangen? Oder ist es {mf|der Anführer selbst, der|die Anführerin selbst, die} es endlich leid ist, sich hinter anderen zu verstecken?"
languages.original_text: "And who now deigns to grace us with their presence? Another gaggle of heretics and traitors thirsting to get their due for what they've done? Or is it the leader {mf|himself|herself}, who has finally grown tired of hiding behind others?"

traits.locale_text: "Und wer erfreut uns nun mit seiner geschätzte Anwesenheit? Eine weitere Schar von Ketzern und Verrätern, die danach dürsten, den Lohn für ihre Taten zu empfangen? Oder ist es {mf|der Anführer selbst, der|die Anführerin selbst, die} es endlich leid ist, sich hinter anderen zu verstecken?"

languages.text: « Tiens, tiens, qui daigne à présent nous gratifier de sa présence ? Encore un ramassis d'hérétiques et de traîtres venus réclamer ce qui est leur est dû pour prix de leur forfaiture ? Ou bien {mf|le chef|la cheffe} de la bande en personne se serait-{mf|il|elle} enfin {mf|lassé|lassée} de se cacher derrière ses sous-fifres ? »
languages.original_text: "And who now deigns to grace us with their presence? Another gaggle of heretics and traitors thirsting to get their due for what they've done? Or is it the leader {mf|himself|herself}, who has finally grown tired of hiding behind others?"

traits.locale_text: « Tiens, tiens, qui daigne à présent nous gratifier de sa présence ? Encore un ramassis d'hérétiques et de traîtres venus réclamer ce qui est leur est dû pour prix de leur forfaiture ? Ou bien {mf|le chef|la cheffe} de la bande en personne se serait-{mf|il|elle} enfin {mf|lassé|lassée} de se cacher derrière ses sous-fifres ? »

languages.text: "Bizleri varlığıyla şereflendiren de kimmiş? Yaptıklarının bedelini ödemek için sabırsızlanan bir grup hain ve kâfirler mi? Yoksa başkalarının arkasına saklanmaktan sıkılmış liderin ta kendisi mi?"
languages.original_text: "And who now deigns to grace us with their presence? Another gaggle of heretics and traitors thirsting to get their due for what they've done? Or is it the leader {mf|himself|herself}, who has finally grown tired of hiding behind others?"

traits.locale_text: "Bizleri varlığıyla şereflendiren de kimmiş? Yaptıklarının bedelini ödemek için sabırsızlanan bir kâfir ve hain sürüsü mü? Yoksa artık diğerlerinin arkasına gizlenmekten sıkılmış liderin ta kendisi mi?"
